articles.title: Astrophotographer captures planetary parade with the moon in stunning photo - Space.com
articles.description: Astrophotographer Josh Dury was able to capture Jupiter, Mercury, Uranus, Mars, Neptune, Saturn and the moon in one single image during a planetary alignment on June 1, 2024.
articles.content:
